article_title: Spillover traffic from Business 40 closure will clog downtown streets
article_text:
Thank you for reading 12 free articles on our site. og.description: Traffic volumes on some downtown streets could double or triple when a major section of Business 40 is closed for two years sometime between 2016 and 2021, traffic studies for the N.C. Department of Transportation show.
